channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Ahead of Black Friday, the DualSense has dropped to its lowest price since September
item.description: Upgrade your gaming with the PS5 DualSense’s adaptive triggers as a pre Black Friday deal drops it to its lowest price since September.

item.title: How to watch Summerwater on Channel 4 — it's *FREE*
item.description: Katherine Kelley stars in this gripping six-part crime thriller, and our guide explains how to watch In Flight online now and free from anywhere.

item.title: The Garmin Epix Pro (Gen 2) is my marathon companion of choice, and it's 50% off in the early Black Friday sales
item.description: Why wait for Black Friday? This Garmin Epix Pro (Gen 2) 50% off deal isn't going to get any better.

item.title: The DJI Pocket 3 vlogging camera gets a huge discount as rumors of its successor ramp up
item.description: The DJI Osmo Pocket 3 falls from $799 to just $528 at Amazon ahead of the Black Friday deals.

item.title: Apple pourrait mettre à la retraite un de ses Mac les plus emblématiques
item.description: Un petit tour et puis s'en va ? Le Mac Pro, relancé en 2023 avec une puce Apple (la M2 Ultra), n'a plus été mis à jour depuis. La grande tour d'Apple pourrait laisser complètement sa place au Mac Studio, déjà plus puissant avec sa M3 Ultra.

item.title: Surveillance tech provider Protei was hacked, its data stolen and its website defaced
item.description: The defacement of Protei's website said "another DPI/SORM provider bites the dust," apparently referring to the company selling its web intercept and surveillance products to phone and internet providers.

item.title: L’objet venu d’ailleurs 3I/Atlas est-il une sonde extraterrestre ? Voici ce qu'indique un réseau mondial de télescopes
item.description: Il existe un réseau mondial grandissant d'astronomes citoyens possesseurs d'un eVscope, dont les observations peuvent être combinées pour faire des découvertes en astronomie. Nul besoin d'être un astronome professionnel pour y contribuer, comme le montre l'application de ce réseau pour tenter de...

item.title: 9 Best Robot Vacuums (2025): Tested and Reviewed in Real Homes
item.description: Whether you’re up against pet hair or you want to splurge on a high-end laser-guided robot vacuum, we have the perfect pick for you.

item.title: James Gunn Clarifies a Few Things About the Jimmy Olsen TV Show
item.description: Plus, somehow they're making a Labubu movie.

item.title: Don't wait for Black Friday when you can get one of the best Switch controllers - and a free carry case - for less right now
item.description: The 8BitDo Ultimate is the best Nintendo Switch controller, and ahead of Black Friday it's enjoying a tremendous discount.

item.title: Mint Mobile’s Black Friday Deal Makes Samsung, Google, and Apple Phones Practically Free With Its 50% Off Unlimited Plan
item.description: Massive holiday savings are available on Samsung's flagship S25 phones, the Google Pixel 10 Pro XL, and Apple's iPhone 17 Pro and 17 Pro Max.

item.title: Bone AI raises $12M to challenge Asia’s defense giants with AI-powered robotics
item.description: Bone AI, a South Korean startup, is combining AI and manufacturing to build next-gen defense robotics and challenge the region’s industry giants.

item.title: Don’t panic: Netflix stock didn’t drop 90%. NFLX shares just split
item.description: The TV streaming giant has executed a previously announced 10-for-1 stock split to make shares more accessible to its employees. Here’s what to know. Unsuspecting Netflix (Nasdaq: NFLX) investors might be startled this morning if they glance at a stock price chart for shares in the TV streamer.

item.title: AirPods Pro 2 are down to a new record-low price, and I'd choose them over the AirPods Pro 3 this Black Friday
item.description: Apple's earbuds hit a new low price in both the UK and US, which makes them a better value than the newer model

item.title: How to transition to a new industry without starting over
item.description: Experts offer their advice on how to change careers. Transitioning to a new industry often seems like a daunting prospect if you feel like you have to start from scratch, but that’s not necessarily the case. There are numerous strategies you can employ to navigate career changes, including translating existing achievements into relevant terms, finding unique opportunity gaps, and leveraging transferable skills in meaningful ways. Take it from professionals who have personally experienced this transition (or have helped others through it): you can build forward from experience rather than start...

item.title: Pré-Black Friday : Boulanger fait -51 % sur un pack Marshall avec enceinte + casque au look inimitable
item.description: En allant sur Boulanger vous avez l'enceinte Marshall Stanmore III et le casque Marshall Major V pour 269,99 euros au lieu de 549,99 euros.

item.title: This affordable TCL TV is one of the best I've tested in 2025, and it's just dropped to a record-low price for Black Friday
item.description: TCL's mid-range TV is exceptional value at full price, but it's dropped back to its lowest price ahead of Black Friday: you don't want to miss out.

item.title: Nvidia ne nous ferait pas attendre ses cartes graphiques RTX 6000 très longtemps
item.description: Début 2027 serait le créneau choisi par Nvidia pour nous délivrer ses premières RTX 6000. Si cette piste se confirme, l'entreprise lancerait ainsi sa nouvelle génération de cartes graphiques gaming deux ans tout rond après l'arrivée des actuelles RTX 5000.

item.title: Microsoft exec responds to Windows 11 AI controversy, but glosses over a key reason for all the hate
item.description: Top Windows 11 exec tries to put out flames around agentic AI controversy – but rage is still burning out there.

item.title: I'm a trained barista, and these are the only 3 Nespresso machine deals you need to know about this Black Friday
item.description: Whether you want a quick shot of espresso or a creamy latte, these top-rated Nespresso machines deliver every time.

item.title: Should I buy a Roomba in the Black Friday sales? No – here's why
item.description: There are bound to be Roomba bargains this Black Friday, but you should approach with caution.

item.title: Avengers: Doomsday could bring back a major Marvel villain from the dead – and reunite us with a former Spider-Man
item.description: Avengers: Doomsday could include two other Marvel characters if a couple of new rumors are to be believed.

item.title: Sick of slow train Wi-Fi? A fix could soon be on the way thanks to this new satellite trial
item.description: UK trains have begun a satellite connectivity trial to improve on-board Wi-Fi speeds.

item.title: The 13 best Black Friday streaming deals so far for Disney+, Hulu, Prime Video and more
item.description: Looking to bag an early Black Friday streaming deal? I've rounded up all the best savings available so far in this guide.

item.title: MSI’s $380 QD-OLED gaming monitor is one of 2025’s best deals so far
item.description: At $380, MSI’s 27-inch 1440p QD-OLED gaming monitor is one of the best purchases Verge readers who want an awesome gaming upgrade can make now. That’s how much it costs in an online-only deal at Costco for membership holders through December 1st. In case you’re curious as to what kind of OLED monitor you can […]

item.title: Intelligence artificielle | L’Union européenne prête à assouplir ses règles
item.description: L’Union européenne s’apprête à assouplir sa régulation sur l’intelligence artificielle (IA) et la protection des données, régulièrement pointée du doigt par les acteurs de la tech des deux côtés de l’Atlantique.

item.title: The Bose QuietComfort Headphones drop to $169.99 on Amazon for Black Friday
item.description: The Bose QuietComfort Headphones are great for blocking out the world and they're on sale now at Amazon for their lowest ever price.

item.title: X launches Chat, its new encrypted DMs
item.description: X has revealed Chat, an encrypted upgrade to the platform’s direct messaging service. It also includes support for video and voice calls, disappearing messages, and file sharing. The company announced Chat on Friday, and it’s available now on iOS and the web, with an Android version coming “soon.” It replaces X’s existing messaging system, though […]...

item.title: Experts cast doubt over Anthropic claims that Claude was hijacked to automate cyberattacks
item.description: No, a rogue AI isn’t launching independent attacks - despite what Anthropic says.

item.title: The People Love Themselves Some ‘Now You See Me’
item.description: The 'Now You See Me' franchise made its return this weekend and beat out 'The Running Man' for the top box office spot.

item.title: Young People Are Tripping on Benadryl—and It’s Always a Bad Time
item.description: Deliriants like Benadryl can bring on terrifying hallucinations in high doses. Some Gen Z-ers are taking at least a dozen pills at a time—and challenging others to do the same.

item.title: Google is collecting troves of data from downgraded Nest thermostats
item.description: Google officially turned off remote control functionality for early Nest Learning Thermostats last month, but it hasn’t stopped collecting a stream of data from these downgraded devices. After digging into the backend, security researcher Cody Kociemba found that the first- and second-generation Nest Learning Thermostats are still sending Google information about manual temperature changes, whether […]...

item.title: Chatbots are no longer just a novelty – here’s how ChatGPT, Gemini, and Copilot are helping you get through the day
item.description: Meet the AI chatbots that are changing the way we live, work, and play.

item.title: Here’s what happened when Ironclad CEO Dan Springer read 80 frontline managers’ reviews of their employees
item.description: Ironclad CEO Dan Springer believes a better performance review process can elevate a company to another level. Hello and welcome to Modern CEO! I’m Stephanie Mehta, CEO and chief content officer of Mansueto Ventures. Each week this newsletter explores inclusive approaches to leadership drawn from conversations with executives and entrepreneurs, and from the pages of Inc. and Fast Company. If you received this newsletter from a friend, you can sign up to get it yourself every Monday morning....

item.title: Bogg has sold $200 million worth of beach bags. Now it wants you to carry one to dinner
item.description: Bogg’s new Bougie bag is a quilted, ‘fancier’ version of its popular carryall. And yes, it still has holes. Over the summer, Bogg bags were ubiquitous at beaches and parks. This year alone, the company has sold more than $100 million of these plastic totes full of holes that come in a rainbow of colors. But now, the brand is trying to get you to bring your Bogg bag to dinner at a fancy restaurant, or the office, or a hot date....

item.title: Create an incentive plan that motivates employees with these 7 steps
item.description: There’s a proven path to building incentive plans that energize employees and fuel real, measurable growth. Ask yourself one question: Is your incentive plan changing employee behavior in a way that drives better business outcomes? If the answer is no, it’s time to rethink your strategy.

item.title: Sakana AI raises $135M Series B at a $2.65B valuation to continue building AI models for Japan
item.description: Sakana AI raised about $135M at a $2.65B post-money valuation in one of Japan’s largest fundraises this year.
